Abilities.Name: Cold Feet
Abilities.Description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

Abilities.Name: Ice Vortex
Abilities.Description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.

Abilities.Name: Chilling Touch
Abilities.Description: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range, heavy magic damage, and movement slow.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Removes cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Ice Blast
Abilities.Description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

Abilities.Name: Release
Abilities.Description: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.

Abilities.Name: Mana Break
Abilities.Description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 50% of the mana burned as damage to the target. Mana Break has 50% effect if caused by illusions.

Abilities.Name: Blink
Abilities.Description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

Abilities.Name: Counterspell
Abilities.Description: Passively grants you magic resistance. Can be activated to create an anti-magic shell around you that sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead of affecting you.

Abilities.Name: Mana Void
Abilities.Description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases stun duration. Mana Void kills cause the enemy's highest cooldown ability to take longer to cool down upon respawning.

Abilities.Name: Berserker's Call
Abilities.Description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

Abilities.Name: Battle Hunger
Abilities.Description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger, half speed from creeps.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes Battle Hunger to be an area of effect ability, and reduces the damage output of affected enemy units.

Abilities.Name: Counter Helix
Abilities.Description: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

Abilities.Name: Culling Blade
Abilities.Description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

Abilities.Name: Nightmare
Abilities.Description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely.

Abilities.Name: Brain Sap
Abilities.Description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Decreases cooldown, cast point, and makes Brain Sap pierce Spell Immunity.

Abilities.Name: Enfeeble
Abilities.Description: Bane's abilities enfeeble his targets, lowering the affected unit's magic and status resistances.

Abilities.Name: Fiend's Grip
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

Abilities.Name: Nightmare End
Abilities.Description: Ends all ongoing Nightmares.

Abilities.Name: Wild Axes
Abilities.Description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes Wild Axes to have no cooldown, and can be used again once they come back.

Abilities.Name: Call of the Wild Boar
Abilities.Description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Call of the Wild Hawk
Abilities.Description: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.

Abilities.Name: Inner Beast
Abilities.Description: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

Abilities.Name: Primal Roar
Abilities.Description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40% movement speed for 3 seconds.

Abilities.Name: Bloodrage
Abilities.Description: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer. If you do not get the last hit, but are within 300 AoE of the dying hero, you will take 50% of the heal.

Abilities.Name: Blood Rite
Abilities.Description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

Abilities.Name: Thirst
Abilities.Description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack speed whenever an enemy hero's health falls below 75%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.

Abilities.Name: Rupture
Abilities.Description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Grants %max_charges_scepter% charges to Rupture with a %charge_restore_time_scepter% seconds replenish time.

Abilities.Name: Penitence
Abilities.Description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly.

Abilities.Name: Holy Persuasion
Abilities.Description: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps, maximum one per level of Hand of God.

Abilities.Name: Divine Favor
Abilities.Description: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and amplifies all health restore by a percentage. Can be cast on allies to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.

Abilities.Name: Hand of God
Abilities.Description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.

Abilities.Name: Crystal Nova
Abilities.Description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

Abilities.Name: Frostbite
Abilities.Description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

Abilities.Name: Arcane Aura
Abilities.Description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.

Abilities.Name: Freezing Field
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.

Abilities.Name: Vacuum
Abilities.Description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Reduces cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Ion Shell
Abilities.Description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

Abilities.Name: Surge
Abilities.Description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of movement speed and removes unit collisions. Allows the unit to surpass the movement speed limit and cannot be slowed.

Abilities.Name: Wall of Replica
Abilities.Description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases Wall length.

Abilities.Name: Poison Touch
Abilities.Description: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked, the debuff duration is refreshed.

Abilities.Name: Shallow Grave
Abilities.Description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.

Abilities.Name: Shadow Wave
Abilities.Description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

Abilities.Name: Bad Juju
Abilities.Description: Passively reduces cooldowns on your abilities and items. Anytime you cast a spell, all nearby enemies will have their armor reduced. Debuff stacks and refreshes duration.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes all of your abilities to fire an attack at nearby enemies when they are cast.

Abilities.Name: Breathe Fire
Abilities.Description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

Abilities.Name: Dragon Tail
Abilities.Description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

Abilities.Name: Dragon Blood
Abilities.Description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

Abilities.Name: Elder Dragon Form
Abilities.Description:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
<font color="#9acd32">LEVEL 1 Green Dragon</font> - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20/20/20/30 poison damage per second for 5/5/5 seconds. Works on structures.
<font color="#ff0000">LEVEL 2 Red Dragon</font> - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 300 radius for 75/75/75/115% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
<font color="#87ceeb">LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon</font> - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by -40/-40/-40/-60% and attack speed by -40/-40/-40/-60 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3/3/3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases the level of your ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount, increased attack range, free pathing and grants additional Magic resistance.

Abilities.Name: Devour
Abilities.Description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed. If autocast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Provides bonus health regeneration for the duration of the spell. Duration is equal to the cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Scorched Earth
Abilities.Description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.

Abilities.Name: Infernal Blade
Abilities.Description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.6 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases stun duration, burn duration and applies Break.

Abilities.Name: Devoured Ability
Abilities.Description: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.

Abilities.Name: Devoured Ability
Abilities.Description: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.

Abilities.Name: Doom
Abilities.Description: Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents an them from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

Abilities.Name: Frost Arrows
Abilities.Description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts %abilityduration% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Gust
Abilities.Description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

Abilities.Name: Multishot
Abilities.Description: Channeling. Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to %abilitychanneltime% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Marksmanship
Abilities.Description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

Abilities.Name: Fissure
Abilities.Description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

Abilities.Name: Enchant Totem
Abilities.Description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 75 bonus attack range on the next attack.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Enchant Totem becomes a %distance_scepter% range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping.

Abilities.Name: Aftershock
Abilities.Description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

Abilities.Name: Echo Slam
Abilities.Description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.

Abilities.Name: Impetus
Abilities.Description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.

Abilities.Name: Enchant
Abilities.Description: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing it's attack damage and max health. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

Abilities.Name: Nature's Attendants
Abilities.Description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Sproink
Abilities.Description: Leaps backward and dodges incoming projectiles.

Abilities.Name: Untouchable
Abilities.Description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Grants new ability: Sproink. Enchantress leaps backward and dodges incoming projectiles.

Abilities.Name: Malefice
Abilities.Description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2/2/2/2 seconds.

Abilities.Name: Demonic Conversion
Abilities.Description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

Abilities.Name: Midnight Pulse
Abilities.Description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

Abilities.Name: Black Hole
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.

Abilities.Name: Time Walk
Abilities.Description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Applies a Time Lock proc to all units at the landing destination.

Abilities.Name: Time Dilation
Abilities.Description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 8/10/12/14 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 10% for each cooldown extended.

Abilities.Name: Time Lock
Abilities.Description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.

Abilities.Name: Chronosphere
Abilities.Description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.

Abilities.Name: Sprout
Abilities.Description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, and providing vision in a 500 radius.

Abilities.Name: Teleportation
Abilities.Description: Teleports to any point on the map.

Abilities.Name: Nature's Call
Abilities.Description: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.

Abilities.Name: Wrath of Nature
Abilities.Description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Enemies that die under this spell grant you bonus damage for 50 seconds.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases damage. If a unit is killed by Wrath of Nature, or within %scepter_buffer% seconds thereafter, a Nature's Call treant will spawn. These treants' health and damage are based on the current level of Nature's Call. If a hero is killed, a Greater Treant will be created, which has %treant_large_hp_bonus_tooltip% health and deals %treant_large_damage_bonus_tooltip% damage.

Abilities.Name: Blade Fury
Abilities.Description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

Abilities.Name: Healing Ward
Abilities.Description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 350 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Blade Dance
Abilities.Description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.

Abilities.Name: Swiftslash
Abilities.Description: Performs a quick Omnislash.

Abilities.Name: Omnislash
Abilities.Description: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Adds a new ability: Swift Slash. Performs a mini omnislash for a short duration.

Abilities.Name: Torrent
Abilities.Description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Adds a new ability: Torrent Storm. Continuously releases visible Torrents around you.

Abilities.Name: Tidebringer
Abilities.Description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

Abilities.Name: X Marks the Spot
Abilities.Description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

Abilities.Name: Torrent Storm
Abilities.Description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area around you once every 0.25 for 5 seconds. Spawns in within 1100 range of you.

Abilities.Name: Ghostship
Abilities.Description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.

Abilities.Name: Return
Abilities.Description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

Abilities.Name: Split Earth
Abilities.Description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

Abilities.Name: Diabolic Edict
Abilities.Description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Deals 40% more damage to towers.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Lightning Storm
Abilities.Description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: While Pulse Nova is active, Lightning Storm will hit one random unit in a radius every %interval_scepter% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Pulse Nova
Abilities.Description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.

Abilities.Name: Frost Blast
Abilities.Description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for %abilityduration% seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage.

Abilities.Name: Frost Shield
Abilities.Description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against you. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.

Abilities.Name: Sinister Gaze
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Casts Sinister Gaze in a target area.

Abilities.Name: Chain Frost
Abilities.Description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10/10/10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.  Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

Abilities.Name: Rage
Abilities.Description: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, and gaining increased movement speed. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

Abilities.Name: Feast
Abilities.Description: Lifestealer's attacks heal himself for a percentage of his target's max health. Increases attack speed.

Abilities.Name: Open Wounds
Abilities.Description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

Abilities.Name: Infest
Abilities.Description: Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Reduces Infest cooldown, increases cast range, and applies Rage buff to the infested unit.

Abilities.Name: Consume
Abilities.Description: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

Abilities.Name: Dragon Slave
Abilities.Description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

Abilities.Name: Light Strike Array
Abilities.Description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

Abilities.Name: Fiery Soul
Abilities.Description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 10 seconds.

Abilities.Name: Laguna Blade
Abilities.Description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.

Abilities.Name: Earth Spike
Abilities.Description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

Abilities.Name: Hex
Abilities.Description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

Abilities.Name: Mana Drain
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

Abilities.Name: Finger of Death
Abilities.Description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

Abilities.Name: Starstorm
Abilities.Description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Passively triggers Starstorm every %interval_scepter% seconds. Does not trigger if the enemy doesn't see Mirana.

Abilities.Name: Sacred Arrow
Abilities.Description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 3.5/4/4.5/5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 180 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

Abilities.Name: Leap
Abilities.Description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 2.5 seconds.

Abilities.Name: Moonlight Shadow
Abilities.Description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movment speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

Abilities.Name: Waveform
Abilities.Description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

Abilities.Name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
Abilities.Description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used.   Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
Abilities.Description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt.   Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
Abilities.Description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.

Abilities.Name: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain)
Abilities.Description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.

Abilities.Name: Morph
Abilities.Description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities with reduced mana cost. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Allows targeting allied heroes. While Morphed, you gain Cast Range increase.

Abilities.Name: Morph Replicate
Abilities.Description: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.

Abilities.Name: Death Pulse
Abilities.Description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.

Abilities.Name: Ghost Shroud
Abilities.Description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Reduces Ghost Shroud cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Heartstopper Aura
Abilities.Description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Passively provides regen for 7 seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases Heartstopper Aura damage while Ghost Shroud is active.

Abilities.Name: Reaper's Scythe
Abilities.Description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have 15/25/35 seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

Abilities.Name: Shadowraze
Abilities.Description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.

Abilities.Name: Shadowraze
Abilities.Description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.

Abilities.Name: Shadowraze
Abilities.Description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.

Abilities.Name: Necromastery
Abilities.Description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains an additional 11 bonus souls.  On death, he releases half of them from bondage.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases max souls.

Abilities.Name: Presence of the Dark Lord
Abilities.Description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

Abilities.Name: Requiem of Souls
Abilities.Description:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed reduced for 0.8 seconds for each line hit. Lines of energy are created for every 2/2/2 souls captured through Necromastery.

Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

Abilities.Name: Void
Abilities.Description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes Void to be an AoE ability. Increases the ministun duration.

Abilities.Name: Crippling Fear
Abilities.Description: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced while near him.  The effect lasts longer at night.

Abilities.Name: Hunter in the Night
Abilities.Description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

Abilities.Name: Dark Ascension
Abilities.Description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Nightstalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.

Talents.Description: +100 Hunter In The Night Attack Speed

Abilities.Name: Purification
Abilities.Description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

Abilities.Name: Heavenly Grace
Abilities.Description: Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them increased Status Resistance, Strength and Health Regeneration. DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

Abilities.Name: Degen Aura
Abilities.Description: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

Abilities.Name: Guardian Angel
Abilities.Description: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants allies immunity from physical damage.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases duration, provides HP regen, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

Abilities.Name: Illusory Orb
Abilities.Description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

Abilities.Name: Waning Rift
Abilities.Description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

Abilities.Name: Phase Shift
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

Abilities.Name: Ethereal Jaunt
Abilities.Description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

Abilities.Name: Dream Coil
Abilities.Description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for 0.5 seconds, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.

Abilities.Name: Meat Hook
Abilities.Description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.

Abilities.Name: Rot
Abilities.Description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

Abilities.Name: Flesh Heap
Abilities.Description: Gives Pudge increased magic resistance, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

Abilities.Name: Eject
Abilities.Description: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.

Abilities.Name: Dismember
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts longer on creeps.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Reduces cooldown and allows targeting an ally to swallow them and heal them for %scepter_regen_pct%%% of their max health per second. The ally can exit whenever they want by issuing a command.

Abilities.Name: Nether Blast
Abilities.Description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.

Abilities.Name: Decrepify
Abilities.Description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.

Abilities.Name: Nether Ward
Abilities.Description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward reduces the causes nearby enemy heroes to lose a percentage of their max mana every second, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward a base damage plus the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.

Abilities.Name: Life Drain
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead. When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Removes cooldown and increases damage.

Abilities.Name: Battery Assault
Abilities.Description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

Abilities.Name: Power Cogs
Abilities.Description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

Abilities.Name: Rocket Flare
Abilities.Description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

Abilities.Name: Overclocking
Abilities.Description: Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.

Abilities.Name: Hookshot
Abilities.Description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Grants new ability: Overclocking. Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.

Abilities.Name: Plasma Field
Abilities.Description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.

Abilities.Name: Static Link
Abilities.Description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Causes Razor to continuously attack the linked target, even while moving. Razor cannot attack other targets during this time.

Abilities.Name: Storm Surge
Abilities.Description: Passively increases the movement speed for you and your allied heroes. Has double the effect on your hero.

Abilities.Name: Eye of the Storm
Abilities.Description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor. Additionally, shocks every unit within a 500 radius of Razor.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures.  When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

Talents.Description: 0.1 Eye of the Storm Strike Interval
+200 Eye of the Storm Passive Damage

Abilities.Name: Smoke Screen
Abilities.Description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.

Abilities.Name: Blink Strike
Abilities.Description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

Abilities.Name: Tricks of the Trade
Abilities.Description: Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases duration, attacks, cast range and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.

Abilities.Name: Cloak and Dagger
Abilities.Description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

Abilities.Name: Burrowstrike
Abilities.Description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by your Burrowstrike and increases its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.

Abilities.Name: Sand Storm
Abilities.Description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.

Abilities.Name: Caustic Finale
Abilities.Description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals less damage if its timer expires.

Abilities.Name: Epicenter
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - After channeling for %abilitychanneltime% seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

Abilities.Name: Ether Shock
Abilities.Description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

Abilities.Name: Hex
Abilities.Description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

Abilities.Name: Shackles
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

Abilities.Name: Mass Serpent Ward
Abilities.Description: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.

Abilities.Name: Guardian Sprint
Abilities.Description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar has unlocked max speed and grants movement speed while in the river.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle or in the river.

Abilities.Name: Slithereen Crush
Abilities.Description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Whenever Slardar casts Slithereen Crush, he creates a puddle of water that is considered a river for movement and bonuses.

Abilities.Name: Bash of the Deep
Abilities.Description: After 3 attacks, your next attack will bash the target.

Abilities.Name: Corrosive Haze
Abilities.Description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

Abilities.Name: Shrapnel
Abilities.Description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every %abilitychargerestoretime% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Headshot
Abilities.Description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly knocks back his enemies.

Abilities.Name: Take Aim
Abilities.Description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to double the attack range bonus for 1 attack. Goes on cooldown after the attack is used.

Abilities.Name: Assassinate
Abilities.Description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and disable the enemy target.

Abilities.Name: Spectral Dagger
Abilities.Description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

Abilities.Name: Desolate
Abilities.Description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a 500 radius around them. Reduces the enemy vision for 5 seconds.

Abilities.Name: Dispersion
Abilities.Description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

Abilities.Name: Reality
Abilities.Description: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.

Abilities.Name: Shadow Step
Abilities.Description: Allows you to perform a single target unit Haunt.

Abilities.Name: Haunt
Abilities.Description: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt. Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Grants new ability: Shadow Step. Allows you to perform a single target unit Haunt

Abilities.Name: Static Remnant
Abilities.Description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts %abilityduration% seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

Abilities.Name: Electric Vortex
Abilities.Description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

Abilities.Name: Overload
Abilities.Description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

Abilities.Name: Ball Lightning
Abilities.Description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 12+0.7% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

Talents.Description: 500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning

Abilities.Name: Storm Hammer
Abilities.Description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases cast range and transports you along the storm hammer, attacking every enemy on impact.

Abilities.Name: Great Cleave
Abilities.Description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

Abilities.Name: Warcry
Abilities.Description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and damage. Additionally increases Sven's own movement speed. Lasts 8 seconds.

Abilities.Name: God's Strength
Abilities.Description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus strength and damage for %abilityduration% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Gush
Abilities.Description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Kraken Shell
Abilities.Description: Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold. Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block. DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

Abilities.Name: Anchor Smash
Abilities.Description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

Abilities.Name: Ravage
Abilities.Description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

Abilities.Name: Laser
Abilities.Description: Fires an intense energy beam, erasing the target's base magic resistance, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes Laser to refract between all visible enemy heroes within range.

Abilities.Name: Heat-Seeking Missile
Abilities.Description: Launches rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500/2500/2500/2500 range.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases Heat-Seeking Missile target count.

Abilities.Name: March of the Machines
Abilities.Description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

Abilities.Name: Rearm
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

Abilities.Name: Avalanche
Abilities.Description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 3x damage to units being tossed.

Abilities.Name: Toss
Abilities.Description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 30% damage.

Abilities.Name: Tree Grab
Abilities.Description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head. Grants bonus attack range but Tiny is slowed by 30. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Grants new ability: Tree Volley. Tiny throws random trees within range towards the targeted aoe.

Abilities.Name: Tree Volley
Abilities.Description: Tiny throws random trees within range towards the targeted aoe. Deals Tiny's attack damage plus a bonus to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.

Abilities.Name: Grow
Abilities.Description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, while slowing his attack speed.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Grants you a new channeling ability, Tree Volley. Tiny throws a random tree within range towards the targeted aoe. Deals Tiny's attack damage plus a bonus to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.

Abilities.Name: Tree Throw
Abilities.Description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.

Abilities.Name: Magic Missile
Abilities.Description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

Abilities.Name: Wave of Terror
Abilities.Description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

Abilities.Name: Vengeance Aura
Abilities.Description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the ranged attack range and primary attribute of nearby friendly units. Spawns a Strong Illusion of Vengeful Spirit when she dies that lasts until it is killed or Vengeful Spirit revives.

Abilities.Name: Nether Swap
Abilities.Description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: After a Nether Swap, enemies around Vengeful Spirit are Feared.

Abilities.Name: Venomous Gale
Abilities.Description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

Abilities.Name: Poison Sting
Abilities.Description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed and reducing the target's HP regeneration.

Abilities.Name: Plague Ward
Abilities.Description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

Abilities.Name: Poison Nova
Abilities.Description: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Poison Attack
Abilities.Description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 5 times.

Abilities.Name: Nethertoxin
Abilities.Description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.

Abilities.Name: Corrosive Skin
Abilities.Description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

Abilities.Name: Viper Strike
Abilities.Description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Decreases mana cost and cooldown, and increases cast range.

Abilities.Name: The Swarm
Abilities.Description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12/12/12/12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

Abilities.Name: Shukuchi
Abilities.Description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining bonus movement speed and the ability to ignore the movement speed limit --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

Abilities.Name: Geminate Attack
Abilities.Description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

Abilities.Name: Time Lapse
Abilities.Description: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience. DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.

Abilities.Name: Shackleshot
Abilities.Description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75/0.75/0.75/0.75.

Abilities.Name: Powershot
Abilities.Description: Windranger charges her bow for up to %abilitychanneltime% second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%.

Abilities.Name: Windrun
Abilities.Description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Grants %max_charges% charges to Windrun, increases movement speed, and removes movement speed limit.

Abilities.Name: Focus Fire
Abilities.Description: Windranger channels the wind to gain 475 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.

Abilities.Name: Paralyzing Cask
Abilities.Description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.

Abilities.Name: Voodoo Restoration
Abilities.Description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo restoration is active.

Abilities.Name: Maledict
Abilities.Description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

Abilities.Name: Death Ward
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within it's attack range. Lasts a maximum of %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

Abilities.Name: Arc Lightning
Abilities.Description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.

Abilities.Name: Lightning Bolt
Abilities.Description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.

Abilities.Name: Static Field
Abilities.Description: Zeus shocks any enemy hit by his abilities, causing damage proportional to their current health.

Abilities.Name: Nimbus
Abilities.Description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

Abilities.Name: Thundergod's Wrath
Abilities.Description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Grants a new ability, creating a cloud that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

Abilities.Name: Spawn Spiderlings
Abilities.Description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

Abilities.Name: Spin Web
Abilities.Description: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every %charge_restore_time% seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases movement speed, removes movement speed limit, and increases Spin Web max count

Abilities.Name: Incapacitating Bite
Abilities.Description: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

Abilities.Name: Insatiable Hunger
Abilities.Description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

Abilities.Name: Wraithfire Blast
Abilities.Description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

Abilities.Name: Vampiric Aura
Abilities.Description: Nearby friendly melee units deal bonus damage and restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units. Lifesteal has a bigger effect on  you. Does not affect allied creeps.

Abilities.Name: Mortal Strike
Abilities.Description: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack. Every two kills on an enemy unit adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.

Abilities.Name: Reincarnation
Abilities.Description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for %scepter_duration% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Shadow Strike
Abilities.Description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for %abilityduration% seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

Abilities.Name: Blink
Abilities.Description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

Abilities.Name: Scream Of Pain
Abilities.Description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

Abilities.Name: Sonic Wave
Abilities.Description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Inner Fire
Abilities.Description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.

Abilities.Name: Burning Spear
Abilities.Description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Berserker's Blood
Abilities.Description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.

Abilities.Name: Life Break
Abilities.Description: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Forces the enemy target to attack you.

Abilities.Name: Dual Breath
Abilities.Description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

Abilities.Name: Ice Path
Abilities.Description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

Abilities.Name: Liquid Fire
Abilities.Description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

Abilities.Name: Macropyre
Abilities.Description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases flame length, duration, and damage.

Abilities.Name: Sticky Napalm
Abilities.Description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10/10/10/10 stacks.  The extra damage is halved against creeps.

Abilities.Name: Flamebreak
Abilities.Description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

Abilities.Name: Firefly
Abilities.Description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. Batrider has bonus day/night vision while Firefly is active.

Abilities.Name: Flaming Lasso
Abilities.Description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within range. The secondary target is tethered to the first.

Abilities.Name: Fatal Bonds
Abilities.Description: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

Abilities.Name: Shadow Word
Abilities.Description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

Abilities.Name: Upheaval
Abilities.Description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to %abilitychanneltime% seconds.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

Abilities.Name: Chaotic Offering
Abilities.Description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60/60/60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Calls %number_of_golems_scepter% Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

Talents.Description: 100% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems

Abilities.Name: Acid Spray
Abilities.Description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

Abilities.Name: Unstable Concoction
Abilities.Description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

Abilities.Name: Greevil's Greed
Abilities.Description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next 40 seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold.

Abilities.Name: Chemical Rage
Abilities.Description: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.

Abilities.Name: Unstable Concoction Throw
Abilities.Description: Throw it before it blows up!

Abilities.Name: Crypt Swarm
Abilities.Description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

Abilities.Name: Silence
Abilities.Description: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

Abilities.Name: Spirit Siphon
Abilities.Description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining 14 + 1/2.5/4/5.5% Max HP per second and steal %movement_slow%% movement speed from the enemy.

Abilities.Name: Exorcism
Abilities.Description: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Whenever an enemy is affected by your spells or when you attack an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for bonus its usual damage then return to you with life.

Abilities.Name: Earthshock
Abilities.Description: Ursa leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for %abilityduration% seconds.

Abilities.Name: Overpower
Abilities.Description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

Abilities.Name: Fury Swipes
Abilities.Description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 8/12/16/20 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

Abilities.Name: Enrage
Abilities.Description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs. DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

Abilities.Name: Shuriken Toss
Abilities.Description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Upgrades Shuriken Toss. Applies Jinada to it, reduces cooldown and increases cast range.

Abilities.Name: Jinada
Abilities.Description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.

Abilities.Name: Shadow Walk
Abilities.Description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will slow the target's movement speed.

Abilities.Name: Track
Abilities.Description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. You move fast when near the tracked unit and deal critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.

Abilities.Name: Arcane Curse
Abilities.Description: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.

Abilities.Name: Glaives of Wisdom
Abilities.Description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. Silencer temporarily steals his target's Intelligence with each hit.

Abilities.Name: Last Word
Abilities.Description: Enchants a target, providing vision of them and causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires. Deals extra damage based on the difference in intelligence between Silencer and the target.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Causes Last Word to become an AoE ability.

Abilities.Name: Global Silence
Abilities.Description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

Abilities.Name: Charge of Darkness
Abilities.Description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Increases Charge of Darkness movement speed and reduces cooldown.

Abilities.Name: Bulldoze
Abilities.Description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.

Abilities.Name: Greater Bash
Abilities.Description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

Abilities.Name: Nether Strike
Abilities.Description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.

Abilities.Name: Quas
Abilities.Description: Allows manipulation of ice elements. Each <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> instance provides increased health regeneration.\n

Abilities.Name: Wex
Abilities.Description: Allows manipulation of storm elements. Each <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.

Abilities.Name: Exort
Abilities.Description: Allows manipulation of fire elements. Each <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> instance provides increased attack damage.

Abilities.Name: Invoked Spell
Abilities.Description: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.

Abilities.Name: Invoked Spell
Abilities.Description: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.

Abilities.Name: Invoke
Abilities.Description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Invoke cooldown is reduced by 0.3 seconds for each orb level.

Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Abilities.Name: Cold Snap
Abilities.Description: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>.

Abilities.Name: Ghost Walk
Abilities.Description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.

Abilities.Name: Tornado
Abilities.Description: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

Abilities.Name: E.M.P.
Abilities.Description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after 2.9 seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.

Abilities.Name: Alacrity
Abilities.Description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> and their damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.

Abilities.Name: Chaos Meteor
Abilities.Description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, and rolling further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.

Abilities.Name: Sun Strike
Abilities.Description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription:
Adds Cataclysm. Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a %cataclysm_cooldown% second cooldown. Creates 2 visible Sun Strikes within %cataclysm_min_range%-%cataclysm_max_range% range of each enemy hero.

Adds one level to the stats provided by Quas, Wex, and Exort on all Invoked spells.

Abilities.Name: Forge Spirit
Abilities.Description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage, mana, and armor are based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes.

Abilities.Name: Ice Wall
Abilities.Description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> and deals damage each second based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.

Abilities.Name: Deafening Blast
Abilities.Description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.

Abilities.Name: Death Pact
Abilities.Description: Clinkz consumes the target enemy unit or skeleton, gaining max health and armor reduction on attack. If a hero dies under this debuff, Clinkz will gain a permanent damage bonus and Death Pact will be refreshed.

Abilities.Name: Searing Arrows
Abilities.Description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

Abilities.Name: Skeleton Walk
Abilities.Description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability. When exiting invisibility, Clinkz gains bonus attack speed.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Creates two skeletons near Clinkz when exiting Skeleton Walk. Increases Skeleton Walk movement speed and unlocks max movement speed.

Abilities.Name: Burning Army
Abilities.Description: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.

Abilities.Name: Arcane Orb
Abilities.Description: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.

Abilities.Name: Astral Imprisonment
Abilities.Description: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and nearby enemies with 400 range. Gains a Sanity's Eclipse charge.
Abilities.UpgradeDescription: Grants charges to Astral Imprisonment. Damage areas stack.

Abilities.Name: Essence Flux
Abilities.Description: Passively grants you a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability. When activated, causes all abilities to slow enemies when they deal damage.

Abilities.Name: Sanity's Eclipse
Abilities.Description:
Unleashes a psychic blast that deals to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.\n

Charge Counter

Eclipse increases Outworld Devourer's max mana with each charge of it's buff. 1 charge is gained per arcane orb hit, and 3 per astral imprisonment, against heroes. Each charge replenishes the existing duration.

Abilities.Name: Disruption
Abilities.Description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

Abilities.Name: Soul Catcher
Abilities.Description: Captures the soul of enemy units in an area, causing them to lose a percentage of their current health. When the debuff is removed, the units gain half of the lost health back. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.

Abilities.Name: Shadow Poison
